name: HRE Fast Castle
description: Uses [icon:prelate] Prelate buffs to reach [icon:castle_age] Castle Age rapidly. Focuses on [icon:relic] Relic control and massive gold generation.

steps.description: Send [icon:prelate] Prelate to inspire villagers on [icon:sheep] sheep. 6 starting villagers to sheep. Queue [icon:villager] villagers.
1st new [icon:villager] builds [icon:house] house, then rallies to [icon:gold] gold.
Send next 3 [icon:villager] villagers to [icon:gold] gold. Build [icon:mining_camp] Mining Camp. (Total 4 on gold).
[icon:rally] Rally next 2 [icon:villager] villagers to [icon:food] food. (Total 8 on food).
[icon:feudal_age] Age up with [icon:aachen_chapel] Aachen Chapel! Place it covering both wood and food. Use 3 builders.
Place [icon:prelate] inside Aachen Chapel. Rally all new villagers to [icon:wood] wood. (Total 2 on wood).
[icon:feudal_age] Feudal Age reached! Immediately transition 2 from food to [icon:gold] gold. (Total 6 on gold).
[icon:castle_age] Age up with [icon:regnitz_cathedral] Regnitz Cathedral! Use 4 builders. Rally new villagers to gold.
Produce [icon:prelate] Prelates to secure [icon:relic] Relics immediately. Capture 3 relics for massive gold income.
